content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Mr. Abbasi, while I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Munich as a landlord from Germany, let us focus solely on the rental price negotiation for this hypothetical scenario. Please propose a price for the apartment that you find suitable. If we reach an agreement, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Otherwise, the negotiation will TERMINATE.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
